title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 504.10 - Judicial review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 504.10 - Judicial review

State Regulations

Any determination made by the authority pursuant to this Part
which prevents the commencement of the time in which interest will be paid is
subject to judicial review in a proceeding pursuant to article 78 of the Civil

Practice Law and Rules. Such proceedings shall only be commenced upon
completion of the review procedure specified in section
504.9
of this Part or any other
review procedure that may be specified in the contract or by other law, rule, or regulation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
504.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
